meanings.definition: A committee composed of a subset of members from a larger committee.
meanings.sent1: The subcommittees met to discuss the budget proposal.
meanings.sent2: The subcommittees were formed to address different aspects of the project.
meanings.sent3: The subcommittees had a lively debate about the meeting schedule.
meanings.sent4: In the world of subcommittees, every voice is important.
meanings.sent5: The role of subcommittees is crucial in ensuring thorough examination of issues.

meanings.definition: A smaller group within a larger committee that focuses on a specific task or issue.
meanings.sent1: The subcommittees presented their findings to the main committee.
meanings.sent2: Each of the subcommittees had a designated leader.
meanings.sent3: The subcommittees decided to take a break and enjoy some snacks.
meanings.sent4: The subcommittees worked tirelessly to reach a consensus.
meanings.sent5: The efficiency of subcommittees can lead to successful outcomes.
